FinancesGuide1: Use this tab to keep track of your balance, know what where your most common expenses, organize by income and expense, and to know when payments are due.
FinancesGuide2: Use the plus button to add a new log, choose a type, amount, and date (if applicable), and watch it go into your history.
FinancesGuide3: Payments will be shown in cards in chronological order, and they can be edited or deleted.
FinancesGuide4: The Balance History can be viewed by clicking on the button on the right of the balance card, where you can also order by chronological or accounting order.
FinancesGuide5: If activated in Settings, payments which are marked as done (deleted) are subtracted from your balance and recorded in your history.
FinancesGuide6: Recurring payments can be activated in settings, allowing for payments to be logged once for multiple months.
TasksGuide1: Use this tab to keep track of what tasks you need to do next, without having to fill in forms, it recognizes natural language!
TasksGuide2: Use the plus button to add a new task, and write naturally what you have to do, as if you were telling yourself.
TasksGuide3: Tasks will be shown in cards in chronological order, and they can be edited or deleted.
SettingsGuide1: Use this tab to turn features on or off, switch language, and even turn on or off Dark Mode!
SettingsGuide2: By default, the Dark Mode and Language settings are based on your device, but you can change it manually.
SettingsGuide3: Settings are stored in your device.
SettingsGuide4: You can choose to erase your data if you want a fresh start.
